page.title: 08MARK HOWES ENGINEERING
page.content: AT THE THICKS, WITNESHAM.WAS ORIGINALLY TWO COTTAGES BUILT IN LATE 1800'S.MR HOWES BOUGHT IT IN 1960,CONVERTED IT TO A HOUSE FOR HIS FAMILY AND MOVED HIS BUSINESS THERE IN 1962.BUSINESS INVOLVES CAR AND LORRY REPAIRS AND RECOVERY AND SPECIALISES IN REPAIRS AND RENOVATION TO MORRIS MINOR CARS.EMPLOYS APPROX. 10 PEOPLE. 1980'S-YOUNG OFFICE STAFF WERE CONCERNED ABOUT DRUGS BEING SMUGGLED IN VIA AIRPORTS AND BEING EASILY AVAILABLE;TERRORISM AND HIJACKING OF AIRCRAFT,AND SO MANY WARS.THOUGHT IT WAS NOW TO LATE TO IMPROVE THE ENVIRONMENT AS THE DAMAGE HAS ALREADY BEEN DONE.
